message_2:
To find the median of this dataset, we first need to ensure that the data is sorted in ascending order, which it already is:

{4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 10, 11, 12}

Since there are 10 data points (an even number), the median will be the average of the two middle values. In this case, the two middle values are 7 and 8.

Median = (7 + 8) / 2 = 15 / 2 = 7.5

So, the median of this dataset is 7.5 hours of sleep.
